pr_title: Convert illegal characters into legal ones.

timeline.bodyText: I don't see anything that tests for the value "\tvalue" which what the original bug was about.
timeline.author: tfmorris

timeline.message: Test tab in key & value string
Convert illegal characters into leagal ones.

Test tab in key & value string

Also fix up test that depended on previous TAB
related error message and clean up logging
